TrendTitle.description: Denotes the trend of the Chart.

TrendColor.description: Support iOS only. Color for `TrendTitle`. Will be overridden if Styles applied. Use HexCode for the color.

TrendImage.description: Support iOS only. The trend image of the Chart.

KPI.description: Support iOS only. A small KPI as a part of the Chart. Does not support CaptionLabel and ProgressView.

Icon.description: This can be an image from a local resource or an image from web (HTTPS only).
